title: Support for lr decay
body_html:
Can we add lr decay to optims? It is common in many SOTA papers. For now only Adagrad has lr_decay parameter.

I can think of different levels of possible lr decay support:

  • just exponential lr decay
  • decay (since [x] steps), (until [x] steps), (every [x] steps) by (exponential | constant) rate
  • custom: user provide a lambda function
